channel.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
channel.description:
I would like to see more gore and longer campaigns.
So? Lets hear it.

item.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

via @geoffkeighley

http://www.gametrailers.com/video/episode-310-gametrailers-tv/65044 This Friday’s GTTV on Spike will feature the world premiere of the next CALL OF DUTY

12:30am Friday morning EST on Spike Tv.

wtf are you talking about?[/quote]

He’s being a pedantic dickhead.

c|p:

PERSONALLY IM WAITING FOR COD 37

Yeah same man, it won’t be the same bullshit as cod36 or cod35 because cod36 was made by treyarch therefore shit, and cod35 was brilliant!!!11111

item.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:40, topic:333747”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=430151.msg3171129#msg3171129 date=1270445974]
They should use there own music in the next trailer and not use a shitty eminem song like IW
[/quote]

I’m sorry, but you’re fucking retarded. Clearly that song is legit.[/quote]

Warn yourself mister, I have a template ready for you:

, You have received a warning for insulting other users and/or staff members. Please cease these activities and abide by the forum rules otherwise we will take further action.

Regards,
The Moparisthebest.com Team.

will be shit
[/quote]

no they arent, their environments arent any better than any other game, they are nothing special

item.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Well I’ve been playing non-stop these past few days and I think finding a match now will pair you up with someone closer to you, e.g. if you live in Aussie you might get paired up with someone in New Zealand and not from the other side of the world. (this doesn’t effect joining a friends match)

Read full topic

item.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:28, topic:333747”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=430151.msg3169882#msg3169882 date=1270342340]

[quote author=eczema3 link=topic=430151.msg3169693#msg3169693 date=1270334427]

http://www.mapmodnews.com/article.php?story=More-Call-of-Duty-7-Details-Revealed
will be shit

what happened to cod5 and 6?
[/quote]cod5 world at war, cod6 modern warfare 2
wtf are you talking about?

and damn, i was under the impression we were talking about modern warfare, not shitty ass call of duty.
[/quote]Modern Warfare 2 is not supposed to be part of the Call of Duty franchise, and is meant to be something entirely different. In fact, putting “Call of Duty” on the box was a last minute decision that would (they thought) help boost sales.

World at War however, is CoD5.[/quote]

Not really, it may be the fifth game, but it was not labelled as call of duty 5: world at war

item.source: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?

item.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

It’ll still be based on the same engine though, following the same tired ol’ formula. New skins and enviroment won’t improve this tired franchise. It needs a brand new engine and re-think to the core game mechanics. It is extremely surprising how fast Activision have been able to exhaust this franchise, i can see Call of duty 4 staying the peak of the franchise.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?

item.title: What do you want to see in the next CoD Game?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:

http://www.mapmodnews.com/article.php?story=More-Call-of-Duty-7-Details-Revealed
will be shit

Not really, the call of duty games are very good at having nice environments, and trey arch cares about the community more than IW does. It will be interesting fighting in a jungle, because not many good Vietnam games were made.
[/quote]

thats because vietnam was a shitty war unless you were on the vietnamese side[/quote]
Not specifically Vietnam, but any sort of jungle warfare games are fun. Bc2 has some Vietnam looking maps.
